channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Flo and Lee are in Southampton to transform an awkwardly shaped plot into a Cypriot-styled paradise for Angus.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia is on her ancestral homeland of Cyprus. There she visits a goat farm to help milk some lively goats and to see how traditional halloumi cheese is made.(S1/E1).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia travels to Mykonos, one of the chicest resorts in Greece. There she cooks red mullet parcels, and baklava - a traditional sweet Greek dessert made with nuts and honey. (S1/E2).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia Buxton visits the island of Crete where she creates Cretan pork, cooked with aubergines, bay leaves and cumin seeds. After that, halvas is the pudding of the day with its semolina-base.(S1/E3).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Rhodes is one of the twelve Dodecanese islands; popular among island-hoppers as they're so close together. Tonia Buxton cooks up a delicious feast of afelia braised pork with coriander seeds.(S1/E4).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Stefan reports on the safety of American chlorinated chicken. Sian learns about the side effects of detox teas. Food made from insects too.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Our intrepid presenters lift the lid on the secrets of our festive food - sprouts, turkeys and why we fall asleep after our massive Christmas Day meals.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard journeys down Britain's longest river, the Severn - once a river of division and conflict, now one of connection.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard journeys down the beautiful River Test. He discovers why this rare chalk stream is so important and how it's threatened by pollution.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Water Babies
channel.desc: A young chimney sweep falsely accused of theft escapes into a river, entering a magical animated underwater world where he helps free captive Water Babies. A British classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.
